name: Nothingways
description:
A puzzle-solving game involving you (Byte) and your friends as you uncover a dark secret.

Made for UCA May Game Jam 22'

made by team blepchamp

Rasmus - 2d artwork and dialogue

Tom Budd - 3d modelling

Cat - coding

Additional thanks to Charlie for debugging

Font Used: https://www.dafont.com/anime-ace-bb.font
